data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: Further to our letter dated 18th August, 2023 and pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015, it is to inform that a meeting with Investors/ Analysts was organized on 23rd August, 2023 to discuss the unaudited financial results of the company for the quarter ended 30th June, 2023 publicly available information and general updates / information about the company as per the details provided below:Date & Time : 23rd August, 2023 @ 3.00 PM to 4.00 PM Name of Organiser : Sunidhi Securities & Finance Ltd Type of Meeting : Conference Call Venue : Corporate Office of Tamil Nadu Newsprint and Papers Limited, No. 67, TNPL Building, Mount Road, Guindy, Chennai - 600032NOTE: No unpublished price sensitive information (UPSI) was shared or discussed in the meeting.Audio Recording of the Investors/ Analysts Meeting is as available in the below link: https://www.tnpl.com/tnpl-disclosure-under-regulation-62-of-the-lodr/Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2023 And Outcome Of The Board Meeting Of The Company Held On 24Th May, 2023
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors in its meeting held on 24th May, 2023 has inter-alia:-
1. Approved Audited Financial Results:
2. Recommendation of Dividend:
3. Compliance of Regulation 33:
4. Press Release:
5. Appointment of Secretarial Auditor of the Company for the financial year 2023-24:
6. Notice of the Annual General Meeting :
7. Book Closure:
8. Cut-off date:
9. Segment Reporting under Ind AS -108: Operating Segments - Disclosure of Lime Sludge Fly Ash Management (LSFM) - Cement with Paper & Paper Board Segment:
10. Appointment of Thiru T Udhayachandran, I.A.S., as Director of TNPL:
11. Notice of Postal Ballot and Appointment of Scrutinizer for seeking shareholder's approval for Appointment of Thiru T Udhayachandran, I.A.S., as Director on the Board of TNPL:

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended                               30Th September, 2022
data.news_body: Pursuant to the Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed the Disclosure of Related Party Transactions for the half year ended 30th September, 2022.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30.09.2022
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. on 10.11.2022 has approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone) for the quarter and half year ended 30.09.2022. A copy of the approved Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone) for the quarter and half year ended 30.09.2022 along with Limited Review Report of M/s Maharaj N R Suresh and Co LLP., Statutory Auditors of our company is enclosed herewith in compliance with SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015. (Annexure-I)

A copy of the Press Release for the said Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone) is enclosed herewith. (Annexure-II)

Necessary arrangements have been made for publication of the Results in newspapers as stipulated under the said regulations.

The Board Meeting commenced at 3:15 P.M. and concluded at 5:45 P.M.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30Th June, 2022
data.news_body: Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th June, 2022

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30.06.2022
data.news_body:
1. The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e on 11.08.2022 has approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone) for the quarter ended 30.06.2022. A copy of the approved Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone) for the quarter ended 30.06.2022 along with Limited Review Report of M/s. A. V. Deven & Co., Statutory Auditors of our Company is enclosed herewith in compliance with SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. (Annexure - I)

2. A copy of the Press Release for the said Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone) is also enclosed herewith. (Annexure - II)

3. Necessary arrangements have been made for publication of the Results in newspapers as stipulated under the said Regulations.

The Board meeting commenced at 3:00 p.m and concluded at 6.25 p.m.

data.news_body: Further to our letter dated 2nd June, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015, it is to inform that a meeting with Investors/ Analysts was organized on 3rd June, 2022 to discuss the audited financial results of the company for the year ended 31.03.2022 publicly available information and general updates / information about the company as per the details provided below:Date & Time - 3rd June, 2022 @  10.00 AM to 12.30 PM Name of Organiser - Sunidhi Securities & Finance Ltd Type of Meeting - Physical Group Meeting Venue - Hotel Grand Hyatt, Kalina, Santacruz East, Mumbai - 400 055NOTE: No unpublished price sensitive information (UPSI) was shared or discussed in the meeting.Presentation and Audio Recording of the Investors/ Analysts Meeting is as available in the below link: https://www.tnpl.com/intimation-to-stock-exchangeKindly take the same on record.

The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. on 12.11.2021 has approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone) for the quarter and half year ended 30.09.2021. A copy of the approved Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone) for the quarter and half year ended 30.09.2021 along with Limited Review Report of M/s A.V.Deven & Co., Statutory Auditors of our company is enclosed herewith in compliance with SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015. data.news_body: Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th June, 2021

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30.06.2021
data.news_body:
1. Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone) for the quarter ended 30.06.2021 along with Limited Review Report of M/s. Brahmayya & Co., Statutory Auditors
2. Press Release
3. Publication of the Results in newspapers
4. Approved the Risk Management Policy
5. In continuation of the earlier letter dt. 02.08.2021, the Company pending Inquiry into Coal Procurement related transactions 2013 has suspended 2 officials and will issue charge sheets. A domestic enquiry will be conducted as per TNPL Service, Conduct, Discipline and Appeal Rules.

6. The trial production of Pulp Mill under Mill Expansion Plan Phase 1 in Unit II is scheduled to commence from end of October, 2021.

The Board meeting commenced at 2:30 p.m and concluded at 8.20 p.m.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 31.12.2020
data.news_body:
1.Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone) for the quarter ended 31.12.2020 along with Limited Review Report of M/s Brahmayya & Co., Statutory Auditors of our company.

2.A copy of the Press Release for the said Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone).

3.Publication of the Results in newspapers.

4.Cessation of CFO: The Board took note of the resignation of Thiru R Ramaseshan, Executive Director (Finance) & Chief Financial Officer (CFO) and Key Managerial Personnel (KMP) of the Company w.e.f. 18th January, 2021.

5.Appointment of Interim CFO: Tmt. Sathya Ananth, General Manager (Finance) as 'Interim CFO and Key Managerial Personnel (KMP) of the Company' with effect from 11th February, 2021.

6.Renewal of RTA: M/s Cameo Corporate Services Ltd., Chennai for a period of 1 (one) year w.e.f. 01.03.2021 to 28.02.2022.
